body:
Please fix the tests. In TF code, you cannot import `from tensorflow`. 

```
Running test tensorflow/python/layers_convolutional_test on GPU 7
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/tmpfs/tmp/bazel/execroot/org_tensorflow/bazel-out/k8-py3-opt/bin/tensorflow/python/layers_convolutional_test.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/layers/convolutional_test.py", line 33, in <module>
    from tensorflow import placeholder, float32
ImportError: cannot import name 'placeholder'
```
